known_issues: Deployment failed during build/deploy pipeline (needs investigation and fix).

existing_features.title: Investigate and fix the root cause of the build/deploy pipeline failure so the project compiles and deploys successfully.
Keep all existing user-facing text in English and ensure the existing global footer content remains unchanged, including the text "Mobile: 9973279335".

new_feature_requests.summary: Make `backend/main.mo` compile reliably on the Internet Computer toolchain by replacing the current `mo:core/Map` usage and any non-compiling Map operations with a supported, correct data structure and APIs (while preserving the existing product CRUD interface semantics).
Implement stable, upgrade-safe persistence for products and `nextId` in the single Motoko actor so product data is retained across canister upgrades/redeploys.

Ensure the backend upgrade/migration setup is consistent with the projectâ€™s migration policy (conditional) by providing/repairing `backend/migration.mo` (and any required wiring) so state initialization/upgrade does not break deployment.

projectName: Fix deployment failure by correcting Motoko backend persistence and migration wiring
